name: Diceworld Kingdoms
description:
Diceworld Kingdoms is a turn based adventure boardgame.

Play with up to 4 players (computer or friends)

over 60 enemies and bosses

tons of items to help you in battle, field or just to annoy your opponents.

Shop smart to get the advantage on your side and ofcourse you need a great deal of luck :).

6 Worlds, 3 open and 3 to unlock.

Lots of special events that can help you even the odds.
